description:
Don't get bogged down by the weight of your rope, this light, thin rope suits mixed terrain and offers an ideal blend of weight and durability. 9.2 hits that sweet spot of light enough for hard redpoints, but substantial enough to spend time working your project.

  • ENDURANCE sheath with SPD technology reduces abrasion and penetration of ice, dust and sand
  • Meets UIAA standard water-repellent test, meaning this rope is fast-drying and resists freezing
  • Triple certified as a single, double, or twin rope use
  • Specs shown are for use as a single rope
  • When used as a half rope, the specs are as follows: static elongation: 8.0% Impact force: 6.0kN, UIAA fall rating: 30. When used as a twin rope, the specs are as follows: static elongation: 4.8% Impact force: 9.2kN, UIAA fall rating: 50
name: Fixe Dominator 9.2mm Rope
